name: Arknights Randomizer
description:
Disclaimer!

This is a fan-made creation. All characters, designs, and art belong to Arknights, Hypergryph, and any officially related entities. 

 

Beta!

Currently, the randomizer is in beta. There's not much you can do with it yet. 

  • If you want to fully randomize all operators and the stage, click the button in the upper right.
  • If you want to randomize specific operators, click on their portraits. 
  • If you want to randomize the stage only, click on the stage image.

Have fun!

  Roadmap!

There are plans for the future including the following:

  • Options list that would allow you to toggle specific operators from appearing in the random pool (either because you don't have the operator, for CN purposes, or because you're allergic to them)
  • Stage difficulty selection
  • Farm stages only option
  • Boss stages only option

This is just a project that I'm making for fun so updates made to it will be at my discretion. Thank you for understanding!

Credits!

All characters, designs, and art belong to Arknights, Hypergryph, and any officially related entities. 

This was made with RPG Maker MZ and using VisuStella plugins and assets.
